meanings.definition: Consisting of, indicating, or involving two.
meanings.sent1: The twins wore matching outfits, showcasing their binaries style.

meanings.definition: A system of two stars revolving around each other under their mutual gravitation.
meanings.sent1: Astronomers observed the movement of binaries in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the gravitational pull between the binaries in the galaxy.
meanings.sent3: The space-themed movie featured a romantic story between two binaries stars.
meanings.sent4: The binaries danced gracefully in their celestial waltz across the universe.
meanings.sent5: The binaries shone brightly, illuminating the darkness of space with their shared light.
